npcMessage.comment: Good. He will know what I need done. It appears that you are ready to fly on your own, fledgling. My last bit of advice is this: learn all you can about both sides of this civil war before choosing a side. Let your conscience guide you. You are more important than you believe and could be the factor that tips the scales. Is there anything you would like to know?

playerMessage.comment: I'd like to know where I can learn to be a pilot.
I'd like to know about the Imperials.
I'd like to know about the Rebels.
I'd like to know about the criminals
I'm set.  Now I just need to earn credits.
